name: After Laika
description:
A short game for two players.

Each player controls one leg of an astronaut dog on the search for Laika's remains.

Player 1 - arrow keys

Player 2 - WASD

Designers: Yonatan Perry, Jasmine Nackash

Developers: Hagar Dolev, Yitzchak Vaknin

Guidance: Barak Shelef, Eran Hilleli, Lior Bruder

Game Jam class, Bezalel 2019
